title: What is the scientific name for plastic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Plastic Which plastic were you referring to? Here are 6 examples of plastics: PET = Polyethylene terephthalateHDPE = high density PolyethyleneLDPE = low density polyethylenePVC = Polyvinyl chloride PP = Polypropylene PS= Polystyrene or Styrofoam There dozens more, some very specialised. I suggest that you Google :The seven types of plasticPlastic - Wikipedia Why did you ask the question? It seems to be rather naive to put it mildly.
